content.title: PatientPort
content.description: React Blockchain web application for managing patient records.

content.title: Rhythm Room
content.description: A web app that allows you to listen to music and watch videos synchronously with other people.

content.title: Crypto App
content.description: A web app that allows you to buy and sell cryptocurrencies. You can also view the current price of each cryptocurrency.

content.title: Crowdpage
content.description: A social media platform for creating and sharing posts. Users can create posts and like other posts.

content.title: COVID-19 Tracker
content.description: Track the current status of COVID-19 in the world based on current data.
